trans-unit.source: >>> AvayaERSConnect.ReadConfig("172.16.1.1", "RW", "securepasswd", "show vlan", to_file = True, to_screen = False)
trans-unit.target: >>> AvayaERSConnect.ReadConfig（“ 172.16.1.1”，“ RW”，“ securepasswd”，“ show vlan”，to_file = True，to_screen = False）

trans-unit.source: >>> AvayaERSConnect.SendConfig("172.16.1.1", "avayatestcmd.txt", "RW", "securepasswd", save_config = True)
trans-unit.target: >>> AvayaERSConnect.SendConfig（“ 172.16.1.1”，“ avayatestcmd.txt”，“ RW”，“ securepasswd”，save_config = True）

trans-unit.source: >>> AvayaERSConnect.SendConfigToMultiDev("RW", "securepasswd", save_config = True)
trans-unit.target: >>> AvayaERSConnect.SendConfigToMultiDev（“ RW”，“ securepasswd”，save_config = True）

trans-unit.source: >>> import AvayaERSConnect
trans-unit.target: >>>导入AvayaERSConnect

trans-unit.source: AvayaERSConnect is published under the MIT License.
trans-unit.target: AvayaERSConnect是在MIT许可下发布的。

trans-unit.source: AvayaERSConnect usable functions:
trans-unit.target: AvayaERSConnect可用功能。

trans-unit.source: AvayaERSConnect’s main purpose is to connect to any Avaya ERS Device via Telnet and perform various administration operations easily, without the need to write any Python code at all.
trans-unit.target: AvayaERSConnect的主要目的是通过Telnet连接到任何Avaya ERS设备，并轻松执行各种管理操作，而无需编写任何Python代码。

trans-unit.source: AvayaERSConnect.py Documentation
trans-unit.target: AvayaERSConnect.py 文档

trans-unit.source: AvayaERSConnect’s main purpose is to connect to any Avaya ERS Device via Telnet and perform various administration operations easily, without the need to write any Python code at all.
trans-unit.target: AvayaERSConnect的主要目的是通过Telnet连接到任何Avaya ERS设备,并轻松执行各种管理操作,完全不需要编写任何Python代码。

trans-unit.source: Checking IP reachability...
trans-unit.target: 检查IP可达性...

trans-unit.source: Commands file was found.
trans-unit.target: 命令文件被发现。

trans-unit.source: Configuration was saved to NVRAM.
trans-unit.target: 配置被保存到NVRAM。

trans-unit.source: Enter IP file name and extension: avayamultiip.txt
trans-unit.target: 输入IP文件名和扩展名:avayamultiip.txt。

trans-unit.source: Enter command file name and extension: avayamulticmd.txt
trans-unit.target: 输入命令文件名和扩展名:avayamulticmd.txt。

trans-unit.source: Example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: IP connectivity from the host / virtual machine to the Avaya ERS device(s)
trans-unit.target: 从主机/虚拟机到Avaya ERS设备的IP连接。

trans-unit.source: Id Name Type Protocol PID Active IVL/SVL Mgmt
trans-unit.target: Id 名称 类型 协议 PID 活动 IVL/SVL Mgmt

trans-unit.source: If both “to_file” and “to_screen” are set to True, the output will be both stored in an external file and printed to the screen. If both are set to False, nothing happens.
trans-unit.target: 如果“ to_file”和“ to_screen”都设置为True，则输出将同时存储在外部文件中并打印到屏幕上。如果两者都设置为False，则什么也不会发生。

trans-unit.source: If you set save_config = False, the configuration is not saved to NVRAM (the configuration may be lost across reboot, if autosave is disabled on the device).
trans-unit.target: 如果您设置save_config=False,则不会将配置保存到NVRAM中(如果设备上的自动保存被禁用,则配置可能会在重启时丢失)。

trans-unit.source: If you set save_config = True, the configuration is saved to NVRAM.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置save_config=True,配置将被保存到NVRAM。

trans-unit.source: If you set to_file = False, the output is not saved to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置to_file=False,则输出不会保存到文件中。

trans-unit.source: If you set to_file = True, then the output of the “show” command is stored inside a file in the current directory, which is going to be automatically named following this format: Hostname_Command.txt. This is useful when querying multiple devices, one by one.
trans-unit.target: 如果将to_file设置为True，则“ show”命令的输出将存储在当前目录中的文件中，该文件将按照以下格式自动命名：Hostname_Command.txt。一一查询多个设备时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: Incorrect device IP address, username or password are used
trans-unit.target: 使用错误的设备IP地址、用户名或密码。

trans-unit.source: Incorrect device IP addresses, username or password are used
trans-unit.target: 使用错误的设备IP地址、用户名或密码。

trans-unit.source: Invalid commands are sent to the device
trans-unit.target: 向设备发送无效命令

trans-unit.source: Invalid filename or inexistent file containing the commands
trans-unit.target: 包含命令的无效文件名或不存在的文件。

trans-unit.source: Let’s consider three Avaya ERS 35xx switches [IPs: 10.105.62.23, 10.105.62.24, 10.105.62.25]:
Let’s create the files we need: one holding the IP addresses and one holding the commands.
trans-unit.target: 让我们创建所需的文件：一个保存IP地址，另一个保存命令。

trans-unit.source: Let’s run the function in the Python interpreter.
trans-unit.target: 让我们在Python解释器中运行该函数。

trans-unit.source: Let’s verify the configuration on the three switches - vlans 77, 88, 99 should have been configured.
trans-unit.target: 让我们验证三个交换机上的配置-VLAN 77、88、99应该已经配置。

trans-unit.source: Main features and requirements for ReadConfig():
trans-unit.target: ReadConfig()的主要功能和要求。

trans-unit.source: Main features and requirements for SendConfig():
trans-unit.target: SendConfig()的主要功能和要求。

trans-unit.source: Main features and requirements for SendConfigToMultiDev():
trans-unit.target: SendConfigToMultiDev()的主要功能和要求。

trans-unit.source: Mandatory: Telnet connectivity should be enabled on each device, using the “cli password telnet local” command, in the Global Configuration mode. Default Avaya credentials for read and write via Telnet are: username: RW , password: securepasswd
trans-unit.target: 强制：在全局配置模式下，应使用“ cli password telnet local”命令在每台设备上启用Telnet连接。通过Telnet进行读取和写入的默认Avaya凭据为：用户名：RW，密码：securepasswd

trans-unit.source: Note: Other functions in the AvayaERSConnect.py file take care of checking IP format validity, IP reachability and commands file path corectness. These functions are not to be used directly in the Python interpreter.
trans-unit.target: 注意:AvayaERSConnect.py文件中的其他函数负责检查IP格式的有效性、IP可到达性和命令文件路径的核心性。这些函数不能直接在Python解释器中使用。

trans-unit.source: Note: Please follow the exact order of arguments (as shown above) when calling the function!
trans-unit.target: 注意:在调用函数时,请严格按照参数的顺序(如上图所示)进行操作!

trans-unit.source: Other necessary arguments are automatically picked up by calling the SendConfig() function from within the SaveConfigToMultiDev() function.
trans-unit.target: 其他必要的参数会通过调用SaveConfig()函数从SaveConfigToMultiDev()函数中自动获取。

trans-unit.source: Output was written to SwitchOne_show_vlan.txt.
trans-unit.target: 输出被写入SwitchOne_show_vlan.txt。

trans-unit.source: Port Members: 1/ALL,2/ALL
trans-unit.target: 港口成员:1/ALL,2/ALL

trans-unit.source: Port Members: ALL
trans-unit.target: 港口成员:所有

trans-unit.source: Port Members: NONE
trans-unit.target: 港口成员。无

trans-unit.source: Prepend the function name with “AvayaERSConnect.” when calling it.
trans-unit.target: 在功能名称前添加“ AvayaERSConnect”。调用时。

trans-unit.source: ReadConfig()
trans-unit.target: ReadConfig()

trans-unit.source: ReadConfig(ip, username, password, show_command, to_file = True, to_screen = False)
trans-unit.target: ReadConfig(ip,username,password,show_command,to_file=True,to_screen=False)

trans-unit.source: Running it inside a Linux host / virtual machine is highly recommended.
trans-unit.target: 强烈建议在Linux主机/虚拟机内运行它。

trans-unit.source: Running it inside the Python interpreter, after importing it: import AvayaERSConnect
trans-unit.target: 在Python解释器里面运行,导入后:导入AvayaERSConnect。

trans-unit.source: Saving the configuration to NVRAM (configuration is kept across reboot, when autosave is disabled on the device) using the save_config argument:
trans-unit.target: 使用save_config参数将配置保存到NVRAM中(当设备上的自动保存被禁用时,配置将在重启期间保存)。

trans-unit.source: SendConfig()
trans-unit.target: SendConfig()

trans-unit.source: SendConfig(ip, cmd_file, username, password, save_config = True)
trans-unit.target: SendConfig(ip,cmd_file,username,password,save_config=True)

trans-unit.source: SendConfigToMultiDev()
trans-unit.target: SendConfigToMultiDev()

trans-unit.source: SendConfigToMultiDev(username, password, save_config = True)
trans-unit.target: SendConfigToMultiDev(username,password,save_config=True)

trans-unit.source: Supported Avaya ERS platforms:
trans-unit.target: 支持Avaya ERS平台。

trans-unit.source: SwitchOne(config)#cli password telnet local
trans-unit.target: SwitchOne(config)#cli password telnet local

trans-unit.source: SwitchOne(config)#show vlan
trans-unit.target: SwitchOne(config)#show vlan

trans-unit.source: Telnet login timeout expires (connectivity / network lag / delay issues)
trans-unit.target: Telnet登录超时(连接/网络滞后/延迟问题)

trans-unit.source: Telnet login timeout expires (connectivity issue)
trans-unit.target: Telnet登录超时(连接问题)

trans-unit.source: The “save_config” argument can be set to either True or False.
trans-unit.target: 可以将“ save_config”参数设置为True或False。

trans-unit.source: The “to_file” argument can be set to either True or False.
trans-unit.target: 可以将“ to_file”参数设置为True或False。

trans-unit.source: The “to_screen” argument can be set to either True or False. When set to True, the command output is printed on the screen, in the Python interpreter.
trans-unit.target: 可以将“ to_screen”参数设置为True或False。设置为True时，命令输出将显示在屏幕上的Python解释器中。

trans-unit.source: The AvayaERSConnect Python module is build using Python 2.7.3, on top of the telnetlib library and it works with any version of Python >= 2.7.x. Other versions below 2.7.x were not tested.
trans-unit.target: AvayaERSConnect Python模块是使用telnetlib库顶部的Python 2.7.3构建的，并且可与任何版本大于2.7.x的Python一起使用。低于2.7.x的其他版本未经测试。

trans-unit.source: The ReadConfig() function in AvayaERSConnect is responsible for connecting to an Avaya device via Telnet, sending a “show” command that the user specifies as an argument and capturing and storing the output of that command. This command should be invoked in the Python interpreter, after importing the AvayaERSConfig module.
trans-unit.target: AvayaERSConnect中的ReadConfig（）函数负责通过Telnet连接到Avaya设备，发送用户指定作为参数的“ show”命令，并捕获并存储该命令的输出。导入AvayaERSConfig模块后，应在Python解释器中调用此命令。

trans-unit.source: The ReadConfig() function returns a customized error message and quits execution if:
trans-unit.target: 如果出现以下情况,ReadConfig()函数会返回一个自定义的错误信息并退出执行。

trans-unit.source: The SendConfig() function in AvayaERSConnect is responsible for connecting to an Avaya device via Telnet, sending configuration commands stored in an external text file, each specified one per line. In the function call, you can also specify whether you want the configuration you just made to be saved to the device’s NVRAM. This command should be invoked in the Python interpreter, after importing the AvayaERSConfig module.
trans-unit.target: AvayaERSConnect中的SendConfig（）函数负责通过Telnet连接到Avaya设备，发送存储在外部文本文件中的配置命令，每行指定一个。在函数调用中，您还可以指定是否要将刚进行的配置保存到设备的NVRAM中。导入AvayaERSConfig模块后，应在Python解释器中调用此命令。

trans-unit.source: The SendConfig() function returns a customized error message and quits execution if:
trans-unit.target: 如果出现以下情况,SendConfig()函数会返回一个自定义的错误信息并退出执行。

trans-unit.source: The SendConfigToMultiDev() function in AvayaERSConnect is responsible for connecting to multiple Avaya devices simultaneously via Telnet, sending configuration commands stored in an external text file, specified one per line. In the function call, you can also specify whether you want the configuration you just made to be saved to the device’s NVRAM or not. This command should be invoked in the Python interpreter, after importing the AvayaERSConfig module.
trans-unit.target: AvayaERSConnect中的SendConfigToMultiDev（）函数负责通过Telnet同时连接到多个Avaya设备，发送存储在外部文本文件中的配置命令，每行指定一个。在函数调用中，您还可以指定是否要将刚刚进行的配置保存到设备的NVRAM中。导入AvayaERSConfig模块后，应在Python解释器中调用此命令。

trans-unit.source: The SendConfigToMultiDev() function returns a customized error message and quits execution if:
trans-unit.target: 如果出现以下情况,SendConfigToMultiDev()函数会返回一个自定义的错误信息并退出执行。

trans-unit.source: The device IP address is unreachable
trans-unit.target: 设备的IP地址无法到达

trans-unit.source: The first argument is the IP address of the device you want to read from, in between double quotes.
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数是你要读取的设备的IP地址,放在双引号之间。

trans-unit.source: The first argument is the IP address of the device you want to write commands to, in between double quotes.
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数是你要写入命令的设备的IP地址,放在双引号之间。

trans-unit.source: The first argument is the Telnet username for logging into the device. This will be “RW” if you leave it at default. “cli password telnet local” should be configured on the device, prior to running the SendConfigToMultiDev() function.
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数是用于登录设备的Telnet用户名。如果将其保留为默认值，则将为“ RW”。在运行SendConfigToMultiDev（）函数之前，应在设备上配置“ cli password telnet local”。

trans-unit.source: The format:
trans-unit.target: 格式:

trans-unit.source: The fourth argument is the “show” command you want to send to the device.
trans-unit.target: 第四个参数是要发送到设备的“ show”命令。

trans-unit.source: The fourth argument is the Telnet password for logging into the device. This will be “securepasswd” if you leave it at default. “cli password telnet local” should be configured on the device, prior to running the SendConfig() function.
trans-unit.target: 第四个参数是用于登录设备的Telnet密码。如果将其保留为默认值，则将为“ securepasswd”。在运行SendConfig（）函数之前，应在设备上配置“ cli password telnet local”。

trans-unit.source: The main prerequisites when using this module are:
trans-unit.target: 使用本模块时,主要的前提条件是:1.

trans-unit.source: The official documentation of telnetlib is accessible here:
trans-unit.target: telnetlib的官方文档可以在这里找到。

trans-unit.source: The second argument is the Telnet password for logging into the device. This will be “securepasswd” if you leave it at default. “cli password telnet local” should be configured on the device, prior to running the SendConfigToMultiDev() function.
trans-unit.target: 第二个参数是用于登录设备的Telnet密码。如果将其保留为默认值，则将为“ securepasswd”。在运行SendConfigToMultiDev（）函数之前，应在设备上配置“ cli password telnet local”。

trans-unit.source: The second argument is the Telnet username for logging into the device. This will be “RW” if you leave it at default. “cli password telnet local” should be configured on the device, prior to running the ReadConfig() function.
trans-unit.target: 第二个参数是用于登录设备的Telnet用户名。如果将其保留为默认值，则将为“ RW”。在运行ReadConfig（）函数之前，应在设备上配置“ cli password telnet local”。

trans-unit.source: The second argument is the filename (+ extension) in which the configuration commands are stored, in between double quotes.
trans-unit.target: 第二个参数是存储配置命令的文件名(+扩展名),用双引号表示。

trans-unit.source: The third argument is the Telnet password for logging into the device. This will be “securepasswd” if you leave it at default. “cli password telnet local” should be configured on the device, prior to running the ReadConfig() function.
trans-unit.target: 第三个参数是用于登录设备的Telnet密码。如果将其保留为默认值，则将为“ securepasswd”。在运行ReadConfig（）函数之前，应在设备上配置“ cli password telnet local”。

trans-unit.source: The third argument is the Telnet username for logging into the device. This will be “RW” if you leave it at default. “cli password telnet local” should be configured on the device, prior to running the SendConfig() function.
trans-unit.target: 第三个参数是用于登录设备的Telnet用户名。如果将其保留为默认值，则将为“ RW”。在运行SendConfig（）函数之前，应在设备上配置“ cli password telnet local”。

trans-unit.source: The user types the Ctrl+C sequence
trans-unit.target: 用户输入Ctrl+C序列

trans-unit.source: This function uses threading for initiating multiple concurrent sessions to multiple Avaya ERS IP addresses, specified inside an external, dedicated file.
trans-unit.target: 该功能使用线程对多个Avaya ERS IP地址发起多个并发会话,这些地址是在一个外部专用文件中指定的。

trans-unit.target: VLAN总数。4
